headline: Is Moody’s (MCO) Diverging From Sector Headwinds Or Just Delayed By Them?
summary: In recent days, Moody’s, a major global provider of credit ratings and financial analytics, has come under pressure after weaker guidance from peer S&P Global raised questions about broader headwinds for the sector just ahead of Moody’s own earnings release. At the same time, analysts broadly maintain an Outperform view on Moody’s and expect quarterly results to show year-over-year growth in revenue and earnings, especially in its core ratings and analytics businesses, highlighting a...

headline: Is It Time To Reassess Moody's (MCO) After The Recent Share Price Slide
summary: If you are wondering whether Moody's current share price makes sense, this article will walk through what the numbers say about value and where the gaps might be. After closing at US$415.09, the stock has seen a 9.3% decline over the last 7 days, a 22.4% decline over 30 days, and is down 16.8% year to date. However, the 3-year and 5-year returns of 40.7% and 55.2% tell a different story over longer periods. Recent share price moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing attention on credit...

headline: New territory: RXO debt rating from Moody’s now below investment-grade cutoff
summary: RXO has seen its debt rating cut by Moody’s to a non-investment grade level. The post New territory: RXO debt rating from Moody’s now below investment-grade cutoff appeared first on FreightWaves.

content.title: New territory: RXO debt rating from Moody’s now below investment-grade cutoff

headline: Rating Agencies Update for CSG: Moody’s Upgrades to Baa3 and Fitch Affirms BBB-
summary: Industrial and technology group CSG continues to strengthen confidence in international capital markets. Moody’s has upgraded the rating of CSG’s backed senior secured debt to Baa3, reflecting improvements in corporate governance following the company’s IPO, a simplified capital structure, and a more conservative financial strategy. Fitch Ratings has also affirmed CSG’s rating at BBB- with a Stable Outlook. Moody’s Investors Service upgraded CSG’s backed senior secured debt from the speculative-

headline: Dow 50,000 Shows This AI-Led Bull Market Has Plenty of Room to Run
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA) quietly passed the 50,000 mark for the very first time—an occasion that warrants donning the “Dow 50,000” hat. Of course, the party was quick to end, with the Dow plunging a few hundred points in the sessions that followed. Undoubtedly, it may not take all too long before the ...
